venue.name: Cambridge Masonic Building - 1950 Massachusetts Ave., Porter Square Cambridge. The Building is convenient to the Red Line and

item.description:
Come out for Acropolis Boston's sidewalk sale this weekend so we can continue sharing the gift of philosophy! All proceeds will help benefit the school's lectures, workshops, and other activities throughout the year. In addition to supporting a great cause, you may just find that seemingly worthless vase or painting that ends up being worth millions on Antique Roadshow...

We are also in need of donations (clothing, books, furniture - anything!) and volunteers for the day of the event. If you are interested in helping out, please contact victoria.tho.nguyen@gmail.com.

group.name: Practical Philosophy -- Application of Timeless Wisdom

item.name: Cambridge Sidewalk Sale
